about_me.first_paragraph: My name is Jakub Rejch, and I am an experienced Senior Lead Developer specializing in frontend and full-stack development. For over four years, I have been building modern web applications, combining my passion for coding with a strong focus on code quality and process optimization.
about_me.second_paragraph: My journey into programming started with an intense period of self-learning—I dedicated 8–10 hours a day for 11 months to mastering my skills. This commitment allowed me to progress rapidly, advancing from Junior React Developer to Software Engineer, and ultimately to my current role.
about_me.third_paragraph: Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on complex projects where I played a crucial role in development and optimization. I was responsible for designing and building a new company website, taking full ownership of both the frontend and application architecture. Additionally, I implemented a translation system to enhance multilingual support and designed an optimized CI/CD pipeline, enabling faster and more secure deployments.
about_me.fourth_paragraph: My expertise spans a wide range of technologies. On the frontend, I work primarily with React, JavaScript, and TypeScript. For backend development, I have experience with Python, Django, and PHP, and I am proficient in working with MySQL databases. In the DevOps domain, I focus on Docker and CI/CD automation, ensuring smooth deployment processes and efficient infrastructure management.
about_me.fifth_paragraph: Outside of programming, I am passionate about fly fishing and squash. Looking ahead, I am eager to deepen my knowledge of containerization at a production level and gain experience in an in-office environment to fully immerse myself in a dynamic team setting.
about_me.sixth_paragraph: I'm always open to new challenges and collaborations—feel free to reach out!
